transcript: Do you have any idea? $50? That's supposed to re-replace everything that I have. Do you understand how much I have packed in there? Not only does it have sentimental value, it can't be replaced like that. It was incredibly expensive.

segments.text: Do you have any idea? $50? That's supposed to re-replace everything that I have.
Do you understand how much I have packed in there?
Not only does it have sentimental value, it can't be replaced like that. It was incredibly expensive.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Do you have any idea-- fifty dollars?  That's supposed to replace everything that I have?  Do you understand how much I have packed in there? Not only does it have sentimental value; it can't be replaced like that.  It was incredibly expensive.
